backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister managing ports and tugboats with CRUD methods and predefined Port of Tema data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding tugboat storage and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend feature implementations, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode, and global styling resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app root and main script with font preloads.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, routing, theming, and role context, defining all app routes and layout.
frontend/src/components/common/DetailDra: Reusable drawer component displaying detailed entity information via a sheet interface.
frontend/src/components/common/KpiCard.t: Component rendering KPI cards with title, value, icon, and optional trend display.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error displays, and empty states for data-fetching UI.
frontend/src/components/common/StatusBad: Renders color-coded badges for various operational statuses across entity types.
Top-level layout combining header, sidebar, and main routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderBar: Header bar showing logo, alerts, and a role selector that updates navigation based on role.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Role-based sidebar navigation that highlights the active route and renders icon-labeled nav items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining a custom harbor-themed color system and utility classes for dark styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/assignments/Assignmen: Dialog for editing an assignment’s status with form controls and mutation handling.
Lists assignments with related vessel and resource info and provides creation and edit actions.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthDetailP: Drawer panel displaying detailed information about a selected berthing point, including identification, location, specs, and operational notes.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/BerthingPage: Loads Port of Tema data and renders the berthing management overview with grouped infrastructure cards.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/berthViewerM: Defines berth scheduling model with size inference, vessel-type mapping, mock schedule generation, and filtering utilities.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/Infrastructu: Displays terminal, quay, and industrial infrastructure in grouped card grids with basic berth attributes.
frontend/src/pages/berthing/PortOfTemaOv: Shows port metadata, infrastructure KPIs, and a table of dry docking stations with their specifications.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/BerthMaste: Berth control dashboard showing berth utilization KPIs and a status table with vessel assignments.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Maintenanc: Displays tugboat health metrics by deriving health scores, showing KPIs, and listing equipment status with utilization.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PortOpsDas: Shows port operations KPIs, recent vessel arrivals, and active assignments with data from vessels, assignments, and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TugDispatc: Provides dispatcher KPIs and detailed tugboat fleet and assignment status, including availability and active jobs.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatHealt: Detail drawer showing a tugboat’s computed health metrics across systems with progress indicators.
frontend/src/pages/tugboats/TugboatsPage: Lists all tugboats with key specs like bollard pull, engine power, and build year in a card grid.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselDetailP: Detail drawer showing vessel info, current berth assignment, and assigned tugboats if applicable.
frontend/src/pages/vessels/VesselsPage.t: Renders the vessels management page with search, table listing, and detail panel using legacy vessel, berth, and assignment queries that currently return empty data.
frontend/src/services/backendClient.ts: Defines React Query keys and exposes a backend actor hook for accessing canister methods.
frontend/src/services/mutations.ts: Contains a deprecated mutation for updating assignment status that now always throws an error and triggers toast notifications.
frontend/src/services/queries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for legacy vessel, berth, assignment, and alert data (returning empty results) and functional hooks for tugboats and Port of Tema data.
frontend/src/state/role.ts: Defines role types, role configurations, and navigation items for different user roles.
frontend/src/state/RoleProvider.tsx: Implements a React context storing the user’s current role with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Declares stub legacy interfaces for vessels, berths, tugboats, assignments, and alerts.
frontend/src/types/temaPort.ts: Defines structured types for Port of Tema metadata, infrastructure, berthing points, dry docks, and grouped infrastructure.
frontend/src/utils/berthSpecs.ts: Utility functions for detecting unspecified berth specs, formatting values, and checking vessel–berth compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with theme extensions, color definitions, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, and requirements for implementing backend-stored tugboat data and displaying it as cards on the tugboats page.
